SideBar.profile:
I started my career as a web developer in my 30s, specializing in modern development with React and Next.js.
My goal is to undertake individual projects in my 30s and achieve monthly earnings of over 1 million yen with the services I develop.

confirm.title: Thank you for your inquiry to WebCreator Ko.
confirm.message:
Dear {name},
Thank you for your inquiry.
Please allow us some time to respond.

We will get back to you with a detailed response as soon as possible, so please wait a little.

Please note that this email is automatically sent, and we are unable to respond to any replies.
Thank you for your understanding.
